Song.title: Behold Our God
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Jordan Kauflin © 2008 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Em | G | D2/F# | Am7 | Em | G | C2 |]
Verse 1: [Bm]Over [C]land, sky, and [G]sea, over [D]man’s great thoughts and [Bm]dreams God sits [C]high on His [G]throne, ruling [D]history [Bm]Nations [C]rage, wars un[G]fold, men seek [D]pow’r they cannot [Bm]hold God re[C]gards their strength with [G]scorn, less than [D]nothing [C]So when I fear what I don’t [G]under[D]stand [C]I’ll trust the [G]One who holds the [D]world{,} in His [C]hands
Chorus: [Em]Behold our [G]God! [D/F#]Sovereign and [Am]good [Em]Matchless in [G]power,{,} the [C]King over all the earth [Em]Fear not, my [G]soul! [D/F#]Trust in His [Am]plan Over [Em]all the [G]world, God [C]reigns Behold our [G]God [| | D/F# | | C | | G |]
Verse 2: [Bm]Over [C]sin’s curse on [G]me, over [D]laws I could not [Bm]keep God, the [C]Judge has de[G]clared{,} all my [D]debts relieved [Bm]Sin re[C]mains close at [G]hand, pressing [D]in with its de[Bm]mands But in my [C]Savior’s risen [G]life,{,} I find [D]victory [C]So when I’m faced with guilt{,} and [G]sin’s do[D]main [C]I’ll trust the [G]One whose death{,} has [D]broken my [C]chains
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 over land sky and sea over mans great thoughts and dreams god sits high on his throne ruling history nations rage wars unfold men seek powr they cannot hold god regards their strength with scorn less than nothing so when i fear what i dont understand ill trust the one who holds the world in his hands chorus behold our god sovereign and good matchless in power the king over all the earth fear not my soul trust in his plan over all the world god reigns behold our god verse 2 over sins curse on me over laws i could not keep god the judge has declared all my debts relieved sin remains close at hand pressing in with its demands but in my saviors risen life i find victory so when im faced with guilt and sins domain ill trust the one whose death has broken my chains
